content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 **the hugs shrug** **difficulty** easy - beginner **materials** kartopu melange wool 100 gr 80 % acrylic 20% wool 170 m color a gray 2 skeins kartopu melange wool 100 gr 80 % acrylic 20% wool 170 m color b green 1 skeins **hook** us size j-10 8 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** 11 st x 8 row **sizes** this sample is 27 heigth and 37 long **stitch key** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet st = stitch treble_crochet = treble_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch stay calm and enjoy sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
